policy.name: svs-DeclarativePullWafPolicy-Web-Type1
policy.description: Policy contains a lot configuration and customized values.

http-protocols.description: Content length should be a positive number
No Host header in HTTP/1.1 request
Body in GET or HEAD requests
Header name with no header value

violations.description: GraphQL data does not comply with format settings
violations.name: VIOL_GRAPHQL_FORMAT

violations.description: Illegal number of frames per message
violations.name: VIOL_WEBSOCKET_FRAMES_PER_MESSAGE_COUNT

violations.description: Parameter value does not comply with regular expression
violations.name: VIOL_PARAMETER_VALUE_REGEXP

violations.description: GWT data does not comply with format settings
violations.name: VIOL_GWT_FORMAT

violations.description: Illegal query string or POST data
violations.name: VIOL_FLOW_DISALLOWED_INPUT

violations.description: Text content found in binary only WebSocket
violations.name: VIOL_WEBSOCKET_TEXT_MESSAGE_NOT_ALLOWED

violations.description: Brute Force: Maximum login attempts are exceeded
violations.name: VIOL_BRUTE_FORCE

violations.description: XML data does not comply with schema or WSDL document
violations.name: VIOL_XML_SCHEMA

violations.description: XML data does not comply with format settings
violations.name: VIOL_XML_FORMAT

violations.description: Plain text data does not comply with format settings
violations.name: VIOL_PLAINTEXT_FORMAT

violations.description: Disallowed file upload content detected in body
violations.name: VIOL_FILE_UPLOAD_IN_BODY

violations.description: Mask not found in client frame
violations.name: VIOL_WEBSOCKET_FRAME_MASKING

violations.description: Request length exceeds defined buffer size
violations.name: VIOL_REQUEST_MAX_LENGTH

violations.description: JSON data does not comply with format settings
violations.name: VIOL_JSON_FORMAT

violations.description: Binary content found in text only WebSocket
violations.name: VIOL_WEBSOCKET_BINARY_MESSAGE_NOT_ALLOWED

violations.description: Illegal meta character in parameter name
violations.name: VIOL_PARAMETER_NAME_METACHAR

violations.description: Null character found in WebSocket text message
violations.name: VIOL_WEBSOCKET_TEXT_NULL_VALUE

violations.description: JSON data does not comply with JSON schema
violations.name: VIOL_JSON_SCHEMA

violations.description: Mitigation action determined by Threat Analysis Platform
violations.name: VIOL_THREAT_ANALYSIS

web-services-securities.description: Timestamp expiration is too far in the future

response-pages.responseHeader:
HTTP/1.1 403 Forbidden
Cache-Control: no-cache
Pragma: no-cache
Connection: close
